page.title: 15Families in Westhill Today.
page.content: The men in Westhill mostly work in the {oil industry}in Aberdeen.Many of them work offshore.The adults ages range from 20 to 40 generally.It is a very young community; probably the most popular size of family in Westhill is around four and five.The homelife in Westhill is much the same as any other place.There are a number of clubs in Westhill like the club for teenagers each night,and squash clubs.There is some employment in Westhill but most people go to Aberdeen.They usually come home between 5 and 6 pm and the children come home at about 4 pm. Almost every family has a car.Some have two cars which they use to take them to their work.Most of the adults get up at about 7 am and leave for work at roughly 8 am, children get up at approximately 8 am and leave for school at 8.30am.
